instruction: Create a playlist of 10 songs that match the tone of the following lyrics
input:
Holding on to the way we used to be,
We only got so far but I still believe.
output:
1. "Unchained Melody" by The Righteous Brothers 
2. "Holding On to Yesterday" by Ambrosia 
3. "Against the Wind" by Bob Seger & the Silver Bullet Band 
4. "Don't Look Back in Anger" by Oasis 
5. "End of the Road" by Boyz II Men 
6. "Take Me Home, Country Roads" by John Denver 
7. "Tears in Heaven" by Eric Clapton 
8. "Make You Feel My Love" by Adele 
9. "Eternal Flame" by The Bangles 
10. "Stuck on You" by Lionel Richie
